on reading compounds: 候補【コウホ】candidate, contender, prospect, pick, choice, list, candidacy, candidature, nomination
時候【ジコウ】season, time of the year
kun reading compounds: 候ふ【そうろう】to serve (by a superior's side), to be, to do
書き候【かきそうろう】(have the honor, honour) to write
御入り候ふ【おんいりそうろう】to go, to come, to be
